about_the_game:
Welcome to Hotel Overloop


1 corridor, 2 elevators, 8 floors, 50+ anomalies.

Explore the enigmatic Hotel Overloop, where each floor repeats the same eerie corridor. Your goal is simple: navigate through this deceptive simplicity and escape the loop.

Your Mission:

  • Detect the Unusual: See something strange? Return to the elevator you came from to avoid worsening your situation.
  • Proceed with Caution: If everything looks normal, move on to the next elevator. But remember, not all is as it seems.
  • Escape: Outsmart the hotel's tricks to find your way out.

Game Features:

  • Mysterious Anomalies: Keep an eye on subtle changes; they're your clues to advance or signs to retreat.
  • Atmospheric Tension: The hotel’s consistent setting is designed to amplify suspense, making each moment in the corridor a tense experience.
  • Simple Yet Challenging: The game’s rules are straightforward, but mastering them will test your alertness and strategic thinking.
  • Play Time: Each session can last from 15 to 60 minutes, perfect for quick plays or extended explorations.

Step into Hotel Overloop, where each corridor could lead to escape or return you to the beginning.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains blood, violence, body parts, jumpscares,

name: Hotel Overloop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-9100 or AMD Ryzen 3 3100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 1060 with 3Gb Video RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: ntel® Core™ i5-10400 or AMD Ryzen 5 5500 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 3060 with 8Gb Ram or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: You’ve stucked into a loop in the mysterious hotel. Find anomalies to escape the hotel’s loop.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
